TEXT.TITLE: GALACTIC RESOURCES LTD <GALCF> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss 1.30 dlrs
    Net loss 25.6 mln
    Revs 20.5 mln
    Note: Prior results not given.
    Shr and net include change in accounting policy, resulting
in loss of 22.8 mln dlrs or 1.16 dlrs share.
    Results in U.S. funds
 Reuter
